artist: Artist: Joel Janowitz; Printer: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis; Publisher: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis
creditline: Highpoint Editions Archive, The Friends of Bruce B. Dayton Acquisition Fund and the Christina N. and Swan J. Turnblad Memorial Fund
description: One-color bleed print from one lithographic plate and monotyping by the artist. The print was then adhered to Arches Cover backing sheet. Being a variant edition, the prints were signed with Roman numerals I/XV–XV /XV.

medium: Color lithograph and monotype, with chine-collé on Arches Cover paper
provenance: Highpoint Editions, Minneapolis (publisher); sold to MIA, 2020.
signed: LR in pencil below image: Janowitz 2005 | BC in pencil below image: APPROACH
title: Approach (VII)
